Body:
"""Wait for a notification when one is not shown."""
with pytest.raises(TimeoutException) as excinfo:
    browser.wait_for_notification(_class)
assert message in str(excinfo.value)
pytest.mark.parametrize('_class, message', [(BaseNotification,
    'No notification was shown'), (AddOnInstallBlocked,
    'AddOnInstallBlocked was not shown')])
